summary.p: Manipulate one or more fields to generate another field. Example manipulations are merge, clip, cull, re-scale, re-position, etc.

description.p: ManipFields is used to create a new Field from applying some operation (or manipulation) on one or more other fields. Example operations include merging two (or more) fields into one field, clipping a field against a clipping plane, culling elements from a field based on some criteria, re-scaling or re-positioning a field's mesh.
A field, or fields, to be manipulated. (dynamic)
The field that results from applying the indicated manipulation to the input fields.
A tab control that contains all the currently known manipulations, which have UI's specific to those manipulations.
Sends a request to the scheduler to have this component started.
